title: Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger          Download a copy of Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site's Jr. Ranger Activity Booklet. You can print the booklet to review before your visit and complete it here. If you can't visit our site in person, but want to become a Jr. Ranger, have your parent or guardian check your work and sign your completed booklet. Mail it to a park ranger here at our site.  We will return your completed booklet, along with a badge and certificate. Jr. Ranger Activity Booklet (Adobe PDF 915 KB)
